185367.「ま まさか 俺が 手塩にかけて強化した\n 無敵のデイジーちゃんが……。:
The invincible Daisy-waisy, who I
painstakingly enhanced in power...
Defeated by the likes of you...?!

185368.「もともと アナタは 優秀な研究者だったはず。\n それなのに 一体どうして こ:
You used to be quite the brilliant researcher,
right? What drove you to do something so
horrible...?

185369.「ハッ。もともと俺は こういう人間さ。\n 優秀なのは 間違いないけどな。昔から:
Hmph. I've always been this way. There is no
denying I am talented, but I never cared much
for ethics. They are much too bothersome.

185370.「あんな チカラや才能が無い奴らを守るための\n システムのせいで 俺みたいに優:
Because of the system that protects those
without power or talent, like you...it hinders
the research of the exceptional, like me.

185371.「それに 多少のギセイで 自分たちの暮らしが\n 豊かになるのなら 大衆どもだっ:
And if even a little deception can improve
life, the masses would gladly turn a blind
eye. They're all just hypocrites...

185373.「チカラや才能を 持たざる者を\n 守るための倫理など 必要ない……ですか。:
You believe that we do not need ethics to
protect those without power or talent...?

185374.「全く不思議です。そういうことを言う方に限って\n どうして ご自分が 持たざる:
It's truly something...those who say such
things forget that one day THEY may be in
such a position themselves.

185375.「……アナタが 幼少期に体験した\n つらい出来事については 把握しております。:
...I am aware of the traumatic experiences
you had during your childhood.

185376.「アナタは まだ ご両親に見つけてほしくて\n 結果を出すのを 焦っているのです:
Are you really still trying to get the
attention of your parents? Is it truly
necessary to go to such lengths...?

185377.「ハッ！ なんの話を しているんだ？\n どんな妄想をしているのか 知らんが\n:
Hah! What are you even saying? I don't know
what's going on in that head of yours, but
I do not need your sympathy.

185378.「造反者リンクス！ そこまでだ！: Lynx, you rebel! That's far enough!

185379.「どんな環境だったとしても 俺はこうなったさ。\n アンタの そういうところと:
It was inevitable that I would end up this
way. I loathed your attitude and how stingy
you were with funding my research.

185380.「……被害者の方々は すでに全員救出し\n 治療をほどこしました。現在は 皆さま:
All of the victims have been rescued and are
receiving treatment. Everyone has recovered
and there seems to be no aftereffects.

185381.「申し遅れましたが わたくしは 世界宿屋協会の\n ゼネラルマネージャーを 務め:
My apologies. I am Sellma, the General
Manager of the World Association of
Innkeepers.

185382.「リンクスの目を 欺くためとは言え\n 正体を隠していて 申し訳ありませんでした:
I apologize that I concealed my true identity
from you. It was necessary to deceive Lynx.

185383.「これまでの非礼 おゆるしください。\n そして ありがとうございました。:
Please forgive me for my rudeness before.
Thank you for your help, truly.

185384.「……じつは ここには リンクスの残した\n メガルーラストーンを 完全解放する:
I have here the report and secret concoction
that allows you to fully unlock the Mega
Zoomstone. I'm sure it will help you.

185385.「リンクスは この技術を よからぬ者たちに\n 売り渡すつもりだったようですが:
Lynx was planning on selling this knowledge
to the wrong people. We want this knowledge
to be public and helpful to all.

185386.「まずは 功労者である <cs_pchero>さまの\n メガルーラストーンを:
First things first. I will unlock the Mega
Zoomstone in recognition of your deeds.
May I borrow your stone for a minute?

185387.ロクサーヌは <cs_pchero>の\nメガルーラストーンを 手に取って\n秘:
Sellma holds up <cs_pchero>'s
Mega Zoomstone and sprinkles it with the
concoction!

185388.「はい！ これで <cs_pchero>さまの\n メガルーラストーンは\n 完:
There we go! Now your Mega Zoomstone has
unlocked its full capabilities!

185389.「こちらは わたくしからの お礼です。\n どうぞ 受けとってくださいませ。:
This is my way of showing my thanks. I hope
it will be useful to you in your future
endeavors.

185390.「さて……どうやら 今回 解放されたのは\n ナドラガンドという いささか\n:
You may now travel to a place called
Nadragand... Quite a special place, it
seems.

185391.「現在は 聖都エジャルナという場所に\n 行き先を 設定しておりますので\n ど:
I've set the current destination to Ejarna.
Why not give it a try?<yesno><close>

185392.「そんなこと おっしゃらず……。\n ぜひ 完全解放された メガルーラストーンを:
Oh, come nowーdon't be like that...
Please give it a try for me, won't you?<yesno><close>

185394.「ご協力 ありがとうございました。\n また会う日まで ごめんあそばせ\n <c:
Thank you so very much for your help.
Until we meet again, <cs_pchero>...

185395.「<cs_pchero>さま お願いです！！\n わたくしは この者を おさえて:
Please, <cs_pchero>! I will deal
with Lynx here! You must do something
about that beast!

185397.<cs_pchero>が 額ぶちの裏に隠された\nスイッチを押すと 机の下に\n:
When <cs_pchero> pressed the switch
behind the painting, a mysterious staircase
leading underground appeared under the desk!

185398.<cs_pchero>は 足音を殺して\nゆっくりと 階段を降りていった……。:
<cs_pchero> carefully descended the
stairs, careful not to make too much noise...

185399.「こんな所で 何をしているんですか？: And what do you think you're doing here?

185400.「はぁ……ま どうせ クスリを 飲ませて\n ここに 連れてくるつもりだったから:
*sigh* Well, since I was planning on bringing
you here after giving you some medicine,
you've saved me the trouble, I suppose...

185401.「ここにいるってことはぁ～ アナタ\n もう 私のこと わかってるんですよね？:
Well...your being here must mean that you
already know all about me, yes?

185402.「そうで～す。私は 甘い言葉で 冒険者たちに\n キケンな石を 使わせて 適合す:
Thaaat's right. I sweet talked adventurers
from all around to use these dangerous stones
and be my test subjects...

185403.「アンタのおかげで プロジェクト・ルーラ……\n つまり メガルーラストーンの研:
Thanks to you, the research on the Mega
Zoomstone...or Project Zoom, have you...
is already nearing completion. However...

185404.「アンタの その貴重な体質は 今後の研究にも\n 活かしたいんだよね。だから 何:
Your unending resolve is just what I need for
my future research. I think I'll just keep you
here for the rest of your days.

185405.「この子は デイジーちゃんっていってね。\n 俺が実験で造りだした かわいいペッ:
This adorable little thing is my Daisy-waisy.
I created her for the purpose of my research.
Let's gather some combat data, shall we?

185406.「は！？\n オマエ いったい 誰だ！？\n どうやって ここに……。: What?! Who are you?! What are you doing...

185407.「<cs_pchero>さまの後をつける\n アナタのうしろを こっそり\n つ:
I quietly followed behind <cs_pchero>
just so I could see what you were up
to down here...

185408.「アナタの悪事 わたくし\n とっくに お見通しで ございます！:
...and I am very well aware of your horrible
misdeeds!

185409.「き……キサマは ロクサーヌッ！！\n 世界宿屋協会のゼネラルマネージャーである:
Y...you...you're Sellma!!
Why is the General Manager of the World
Association of Innkeepers here?!

185410.「それは もちろん 自分の研究のために\n 他人をギセイにする アナタのような悪:
Of course I'm here! I can't just overlook scum
like you who uses innocent people as pawns
for their research!

185411.「さあ リンクス！\n ムダなご抵抗は おやめになって\n おなわに おつきにな:
Lynx! Stop this meaningless resistance and
surrender peacefully! Come with me, now!

185412.「クソッ どこまでも 不愉快な女だ！\n そう言われて 素直に従うと思っているの:
Blasted...! Such an annoying woman! You think
I'll just give up and go with you?!
Ridiculous! I'll leave you to deal with this!

185413.「お待ちなさい！！\n そうは させませんわよ！！: Stop right there!! You're not going anywhere!

185414.「この女……スキが まったく 見当たらない！:
Her...her defenses are impenetrable! I can't
see a way through!

185415.「<cs_pchero>さま お願いです！！\n わたくしは この者の相手をしま:
Please, <cs_pchero>! I will deal
with Lynx here! You must do something
about that beast!

191787.「……フフッ。なかなか よい施設でしょう？\n 発掘された 古代遺跡の研究所を\:
Hmm hmm...it's quite the spectacle, yes? I
spent a lot of time restoring this laboratory
deep within these excavated ruins.
